data.meta_description:
Arlean J. Flanders age 82, of Spring Valley passed away on Monday February 5, 2018 at Mayo Clinic Health System-Eau Claire.
Arlean was born April 17, 1935 at home in the Township of Eau Galle. …
data.text:
Cynthia Schille February 14, 2018, at 10:02pm

Sorry to hear of Arlean's passing . She was a special lady, so loving and kind. Praying for the family left behind. My condolences to all her loved ones.

Sandy Jerry Carroll February 14, 2018, at 8:31pm

Sending our prayers and thoughts of comfort for your loss of your Mom , Arlean. We have many fun memories growing up on 11th and Laurel with your family as our neighbors. She was a special lady and we are sorry.

Bruce Jerry February 14, 2018, at 6:46pm

Here it is 2_14_18 and I just learned of your Mom's passing. Mostly I remember her great laughing and fun spirit. She and your family have always been supporting of the Jerry family. I know you all miss so much.Love and prayers.Bruce

Deanna Dillon (jerry) February 14, 2018, at 5:27pm

To the family of Arlene. So sorry for the loss of your mom. Sue I'm glad we made the trip to visit your mom and dad. when I was in MN. God bless you & know your comfort comes from the Lord. Your families in my prayers at this difficult time. Deanna an old neighbor

Mary Nielsen February 10, 2018, at 6:41pm

Sue, I’m sad to see that you lost your mom. I know your heart is heavy. Cherish your memories as she will live forever in you.

Betty DeLong Davison February 10, 2018, at 3:40pm

I knew Arlean many years, I graduated from High School with her in 1953. My husband Dennis was their best man when they were married in Stillwater, Mn in 1952. My condolances to the family.

Agnes Patterson February 8, 2018, at 6:35pm

I wanted to come to the visitation, but I got lost. I remember your mom when she lived at Gaylord Nelson apt. building. I couldn't talk to your for awhile, no phone number to talk to her. My condolence to the family.

Reta Sanford February 8, 2018, at 11:02am

Arlean was such a special person. I was privileged to have her touch my life in so many great ways. She was a real asset to the Pierce County Historical Association. She excelled in every endeavor she undertook. I am saddened to hear of her passing. My heartfelt sympathy to her family.

Wilma Baskin Heimkes February 7, 2018, at 9:02pm

I am so sorry for our loss. Arlean was both a classmate and my cousin. My prayers are with her family.

Wilma Baskin Heimkes

Joanne February 7, 2018, at 6:07pm

Sympathy to Arlenes family. She was such a sweet lady, with wonderful children. Remember the happy times. God Bless.

dan hince February 7, 2018, at 5:56pm

We were saddened hearing the news of Arlean passing. I've very fond memories of my childhood spending time with Nate, visiting with her and Lavern. She always had a twinkle in her eyes, a laugh that was infectious, her smile eternal. God bless her and those she loved.

Marilyn Galoff February 7, 2018, at 9:31am

I am sorry to hear about Arlean. Your family are in my prayers.

Ginny February 7, 2018, at 5:50am

My condolences to the family!

My mom (Verna Gesche) was an Avon rep. at the same time as Arlean. She enjoyed Arlean. Her warm and happy ways.

Amy Cady February 6, 2018, at 12:39pm

Craig and family, sorry to hear of your Mom’s passing. Thoughts and prayers go out to all of you. Jeff & Amy

Brenda Kado February 6, 2018, at 7:42am

Arleen was such a special, warm, loving generous woman. I enjoyed her smiles and great sense of humor. Even though life was not easy, she did not complain. I am so sorry for your loss and so sorry that I will be out of town and not able to come to the services. God be with you all!!! Brenda

Pamela Fuhrman February 6, 2018, at 5:50am

So sorry to hear about your loss of such a wonderful lady. My thoughts and prayers are with all.

Jeanelle Mandelkow February 5, 2018, at 10:14pm

Sorry for your loss. Met Arlene when she was going door to door selling Avon. She would stop and my parents. We always bought our Christmas tree from Arlene and Toad, until they moved out of Rock Elm. Enjoyed our talks. I am sure that Arlene and my Mom (Delores Hague) is having a nice time catching up. Arlene will always be with you!

Carrie Micko February 5, 2018, at 9:46pm

May you feel the comforting presence of God as you grieve, and may her memory be for a blessing.

Donna Anderson - Truckenbrod February 5, 2018, at 4:26pm

My deepest sympathy to the Flanders family ... My many memories of Arlene are something I will never forget ... The nights I stayed over night, cutting my own Christmas tree down, having supper at here house and just visiting with family for hours on end..... May you rest in peace Arlene
